ConnectionStrings.DefaultConnection: Data Source=192.168.1.179; Initial Catalog=master; Integrated Security=False; User ID=Developer;Password=Dev001$;

SqlQueries.Dictionary: SELECT dct.Id ,dct.Name ,dct.Description ,dct.SqlExpression FROM Development.TeamServices.vDictionary AS dct
SqlQueries.DictionaryInsert: INSERT INTO Development.TeamServices.vDictionary (Name, Description, SqlExpression) Values (@Name, @Description, @SqlExpression)
SqlQueries.Files: SELECT fls.Id ,fls.Name ,fls.Description ,fls.FileName FROM Development.TeamServices.vFiles AS fls
SqlQueries.Links: SELECT lnk.Id, lnk.Name, lnk.Url FROM TeamServices.Links AS lnk
SqlQueries.Projects: SELECT prj.Id, prj.Name, prj.Description, prj.LogoPath FROM TeamServices.Projects AS prj
SqlQueries.Quote: SELECT qts.id, qts.text, qts.author FROM Development.TeamServices.vQuotes AS qts
SqlQueries.Users: SELECT usr.Id ,usr.MachineName ,usr.Name ,usr.Birthday ,usr.IpAddress FROM Development.TeamServices.vUsers AS usr
